DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : INTERNATIONAL
DOC.TEXT: Joblessness Continues to Dog European Recovery : New forecasts by the European Union project that unemployment -- already at a record high 10.9 % -- will climb to 11.7 % before year ' s end , even as the Continent ' s economies emerge from recession . Economic Affairs Commissioner Henning Christophersen said the data underscores the importance of such proposed reforms as deregulating labor_markets , shrinking social_security systems , slicing budget_deficits across Europe and boosting public works spending .
